meaningMnemonic: A <radical>canopy</radical> and a <radical>helicopter</radical> are being <radical>compare</radical>d by a <kanji>deer</kanji>. The deer is standing very still (as deer do) and looking very slowly between the empty canopy and the helicopter sitting next to it.
readingMnemonic: You walk forward, about to call out to the <kanji>deer</kanji>, when a <reading>ca</reading>r (か) suddenly appears out of no where and runs the deer over! Was this all just a trap set up to murder the deer?!
